title: Summer Internship
description: We are looking for a passionate and curious Creative Tech Intern to join our team for an exciting internship experience. As an intern, you will work alongside designers, developers, and strategists on real-world projects, contributing ideas, building prototypes, and learning the ins and outs of how a modern creative team operates.

title: Monsoon Internship
description: Join our dev team to build and test web applications, fix bugs, and learn industry-standard tools and practices. Great opportunity to sharpen your coding skills in a real-world environment.

title: Winter Internship
description: Assist in content creation, social media management, and campaign analysis. Gain hands-on experience with digital marketing tools while working on live campaigns.
